effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 480,433.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Become the pinnacle of Gallagio service excellence and dole out Kaja'Cola Mega-Lite to injured allies 10 times over 4 sec, healing them for 1 million and increasing their Speed by 1,887 for 5 sec. The number of servings is increased by your Haste. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,220 and Haste by 8,172.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 306,963, and Intellect by 7,751.
Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ela'lothen's Jewel of Rebirth
